title: The Facebook Hack No One is Talking About
description:
It's the worst data breach in Facebook history. But it's hardly being talked about. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Sarah Frier about the  security breach to Facebook's system that affected almost 50 million users and why it's not dominating the headlines. 
FOLLOW UP 
Sarah's latest: Facebook's Worst Security Breach Hammers User Trust Once Again
You can follow Sarah at @sarahfrier
